greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Distance of 2^n from its nearest prime neighbor and in case of a tie, choose the smaller.
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4500
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 0}, While[ !PrimeQ[2^n - k] && !PrimeQ[2^n + k], k++ ]; Min@Select[{2^n - k, 2^n + k}, PrimeQ@# &]]; Table[2^n - f[n], {n, 0, 85}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 14 2006 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 02 2001
ext: Signs added by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 14 2006
